channel.title: NICOLA'S Live Audio Shows
channel.description:
NICOLA and the Band perform live and archived in case you could not make it to the show! Feel free to comment on our shows or anything else we publish.
www.nicolanicola.com www.myspace.com/nicola www.nicolanicola.podomatic.com www.nicolanyc.podomatic.com www.youtube.com/nicolanicola www.cdbaby.com/nicolanyc4
channel.itunes:subtitle: Audio Podcast of LIVE Complete Shows archived in case you missed it! Listen and enjoy! Keep the podcast going by buying a CD in support. Rock on!
channel.itunes:author: nicola
channel.itunes:summary:
NICOLA and the Band perform live and archived in case you could not make it to the show! Feel free to comment on our shows or anything else we publish.

item.title: Nicola - Live at Starving Artist Cafe - City Island, NY - April 3, 2010
item.description: April 3, 2010 Live Audio Podcast of 2nd. set of show at Starving Artist - City Island, NY Another packed house that was sizzling hot! Nicola on vocals and guitar Ray "Chino" Diaz on percussion Includes several encores with an acoustic version of Chaka Kahn's "Ain't Nobody" at the end! www.nicolanicola.com www.myspace.com/nicola www.facebook.com/nicolanyc www.twitter.com/nicolanicola www.youtube.com/nicolanicola www.reverbnation.com/nicolanicola www.starvingartistonline.com
item.dc:creator: nicola
item.itunes:summary:
April 3, 2010 Live Audio Podcast of 2nd. set of show at Starving Artist - City Island, NY Another packed house that was sizzling hot! Nicola on vocals and guitar Ray "Chino" Diaz on percussion
Includes several encores with an acoustic version of Chaka Kahn's "Ain't Nobody" at the end!
www.nicolanicola.com www.myspace.com/nicola www.facebook.com/nicolanyc www.twitter.com/nicolanicola www.youtube.com/nicolanicola www.reverbnation.com/nicolanicola www.starvingartistonline.com

item.title: NICOLA Live CD Release Party @Piano's - Full Band - 5/2/08
item.description: This CD release party show features our 5 piece band performing live at Piano's in NYC 5/2/08! www.nicolanicola.com www.myspace.com/nicola www.nicolanicola.podomatic.com www.nicolanyc.podomatic.com www.youtube.com/nicolanicola www.cdbaby.com/nicolanyc4 ALSO DON'T FORGET TO VOTE THIS SUNDAY 8/17 AT 8PM THRU TO MONDAY 8/18 8PM FOR NICOLA TO PERFORM AT MSG! GO TO: www.msg.com/votesoundtracks
